channel.title: AI & Telecom News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI & Telecom insights curated by n8n + Perplexity

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Telecoms must adopt generative AI to reduce costs, drive growth, improve security, and transform into technology-driven companies offering AI-powered services.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: AWS has chosen 40 startups for its 2025 Generative AI Accelerator, providing up to $1 million in AWS credits and expert support.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The telecom industry is rapidly adopting generative AI, with half of surveyed companies already implementing initial solutions, signaling significant AI integration by 2025.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Morgan Stanley's 2025 TMT conference highlights emerging trends in generative AI and transformative themes driving the technology, media, and telecom sectors.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Deloitte Insights predicts telcos will focus on generative AI in 2025 as a key growth driver across industries.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The article highlights 150 AI use cases from startups and digital natives, featuring Cursor, an AI-powered code editor with advanced generative AI and autonomous agent capabilities.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: ZTE advances intelligent network solutions by integrating AI technologies to enhance telecom infrastructure and services.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Generative AI, combined with AI-native platforms, zero trust, and quantum encryption, is driving transformative growth and enhanced security in the telecom industry.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The Richmond Fed questions if current AI investments resemble the 1990s telecom boom and bust, hinting at a potential AI bubble.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A new report highlights that 83% of telco leaders fear falling behind and urges telcos to adopt Generative AI to achieve productivity gains sought by 63%.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Singtel Enterprise is advancing AI-driven network slicing, digital twins, and autonomous networks to become an AI-first telecommunications company.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Malaysia launches Ryt Bank, its first AI-powered bank, while Google's Veo 3 AI video creation tools become widely available.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: A global study of 100+ tier-1 telecom executives reveals emerging generative AI opportunities transforming the telecom industry's future.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Telefónica highlights major hyperscalers like AWS, Azure, and GCP integrating generative AI, foundational models, and synthetic data to shape the future of public clouds.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Keysight Technologies will demonstrate its AI-enabled 6G and advanced wireless technologies at the October 8–11, 2025 event, highlighting next-gen connectivity solutions.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: The article lists the top 26 generative AI development companies in October 2025, highlighting their expertise in ChatGPT, LLMs, and AI-driven business solutions.
